Package org.world.agents.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
org.world.GameObject
org.world.agents.player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<GameObject>
public final class Player
extends GameObject
This class implements a playable character capable of interaction with the game world The player object is capable of moving around the game world and attacking enemies The control scheme is handled by the KeyListener class Attacks are implemented through the Weapon class

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Player.ANIMATIONS
    Animation enum to hold indices, no.

    void setControllable​(boolean controllable)
    Sets the controllable flag to the given boolean value
    void setInertia​(float inertia)
    Sets player's inertia After the player stops moving, it slides a certain distance proportional to the current inertia value If the given value is outside of the possible inertia range ( 6f to 30f) the value is set to the minimum or respectively maximum values Useful for making slippery surfaces in the game
    void setInvincible​(boolean invincible)
    Sets the invincibility of the player

    Sets the player's inertia value (slide distance) on the x axis Can be used to push the player object around
    void setYInertia​(int yInertia)
    Sets the player's inertia value (slide distance) on the y axis Can be used to push the player object around
    void update()
    Updates the state of the player

      Returns:

    • setInertia

      public void setInertia​(float inertia)
      Sets player's inertia After the player stops moving, it slides a certain distance proportional to the current inertia value If the given value is outside of the possible inertia range ( 6f to 30f) the value is set to the minimum or respectively maximum values Useful for making slippery surfaces in the game
      Parameters:
      inertia - inertia as a float

    • isInvincible

      public boolean isInvincible()
      Checks whether the player ois invincible or not An invincible player cannot be damaged

      Sets the invincibility of the player
      Parameters:
      invincible - boolean with desired value

      public void decreaseStamina​(int amount)
